trans-unit.source: Command identifier of the button

target.mrk: Command identifier of the button

trans-unit.source: Image index of the button. Set this member to $I_IMAGECALLBACK, and the toolbar will send the $TBN_GETDISPINFO notification to retrieve the image index when it is needed.

seg-source.mrk: Image index of the button.
Set this member to $I_IMAGECALLBACK, and the toolbar will send the $TBN_GETDISPINFO notification to retrieve the image index when it is needed.

target.mrk: Image index of the button.
Set this member to $I_IMAGECALLBACK, and the toolbar will send the $TBN_GETDISPINFO notification to retrieve the image index when it is needed.

trans-unit.source: Set this member to $I_IMAGENONE to indicate that the button does not have an image.

seg-source.mrk: Set this member to $I_IMAGENONE to indicate that the button does not have an image.

target.mrk: Set this member to $I_IMAGENONE to indicate that the button does not have an image.
